name: Viva Duke Nukem
description:
A weird psychedelic DOS first person shooter prototype. Inspired by the adventures of Duke Nukem, weird movies and the great first person shooters of the 90s.

The engine is completely custom. it can make use of three different rendering methods: raycasting, voxels, and sectors.

Credits:

erysdren - Programming
Terra Storm - Sprites
YashaBun - Level Design
necrolavigne - Textures

You can follow the development here:
https://github.com/JaycieErysdren/RexEngine
